import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validator, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-reservation-form', templateUrl: './reservation-form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./reservation-form.component.css'], }) export class ReservationFormComponent implements OnInit { reservationForm: FormGroup = new FormGroup({}); constructor(private formBuilder: FormBuilder) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.reservationForm = this.formBuilder.group({ checkInDate: ['', Validators.required], checkOutDate: ['', Validators.required], guestName: ['', Validators.required], guestEmail: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]], roomNumber: ['', Validators.required], }); } onSubmit() { if (this.reservationForm.valid) { console.log('Valid Form'); } } }
Check-In Date is required!
Check-In Date is required!
